question: Khwaja Moinuddin Chishti Urdu Arabi-Farsi University is located at which of the following places of Uttar Pradesh?
explanation: Khwaja Moinuddin Chishti Urdu Arabi-Farsi University is located in Lucknow. Recently, the cabinet has decided a new name for the university which is "Khwaja Moinuddin Chishti Languages University".
